title: Life Chain And The True Horror Of The Eldritch Goblin (Part 2)
body:
Life Chain And The True Horror Of The Eldritch Goblin (Part 2)

*Gulp

"You scared?" Edward asked in a mocking tone, noticing Julian swallowing his saliva from time to time.

"Scared? Why would I be scared?"

"If you are not scared then stop looking at them and focus in front of you."

"I am not looking at them," Julian said in a serious voice hearing Edward. "I am just monitoring them so that they won't be able to do anything suspicious."

Edward shook his head hearing Julian and stopped bothering him. He looked in front of the city wall and sighed inwardly.

'Let's hope everything goes well.'

"Are you all ready? Our scouts have just informed us that the monster army will be here in half an hour." Sebastian landed in front of the city walls and asked Elysia who was standing in the lead of the shadow undeads.
